rows.label: qst711602_msg0002
rows.name:
Now they should know how scary
it is to mess with a Nopon, mo!

rows.label: qst711602_msg0003
rows.name:
From now on, I can enjoy
my nap time in peace, mo!

rows.label: qst711602_msg0004
rows.name: Well then, thank you so much, mo!

rows.label: qst711602_msg0101
rows.name:
The monster that bullied
Punpun is officially named
Myrrhes Crustip, mo!

rows.label: qst711602_msg0102
rows.name:
Its comrades are all over the
swamp near this camp, mo!

rows.label: qst711602_msg0103
rows.name:
If you defeat about three of them,
Punpun will be satisfied, mo!
